reference.shortdesc: The wintitle element can be used to mark up names of windows or dialogs, or other user interface elements at the same level of grouping, including wizard titles, wizard page titles, and window pane titles. This element is part of the DITA user interface domain, a special set of DITA elements designed to document user interface tasks, concepts and reference information.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <step> <cmd>Click <uicontrol>Configure</uicontrol>.</cmd> <stepresult>The <wintitle>Configuration Options</wintitle> window opens with your last set of selections highlighted.</stepresult> </step>
